title: Buggy champ select
body: I have had my client bug out many times in the champion select where the screens black or cannot see any hovers and such and its extremely annoying when I get in series and get a free loss for no reason

replies.body: These black screens and issues may indicate a bad connection that's causing you to lose sync as well as fail to download assets.  Give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to help tune up your network and get back in-game.  Hope that helps!
